generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Anton&family=Noto+Sans+JP:wght@400;700&display=swap");@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Dosis:wght@400;700&family=Metal+Mania&display=swap");@keyframes anim-main-swell{0%{transform:translate(-50%,-50%) scale(1)}to{transform:translate(-50%,-50%) scale(1.2)}}*{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}:active{outline:none}a{text-decoration:none}ul,ul li{list-style:none}body{background-color:#fee903;font-family:Noto Sans JP,sans-serif;font-weight:400;font-size:62.5%;letter-spacing:.8px}.section{height:100vh;width:100vw;position:relative}.section#section-main{background-color:#fee903;height:115vh}.section#section-main img{width:55%;position:fixed;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);animation-name:anim-main-swell;animation-duration:2.5s;animation-delay:.4s;animation-iteration-count:infinite;animation-direction:alternate}.section#section-main .section-main-reward{width:100%;text-align:center;position:fixed;top:2.8rem;opacity:0;transition:opacity 1s ease-in}.section#section-main .section-main-reward .section-main-reward--quote{font-size:.7rem;font-weight:700;font-style:italic;margin-bottom:.3rem}.section#section-main .section-main-reward.active{opacity:1}.section#section-tagline{height:120vh;background-color:#000;clip-path:polygon(0 0,100% 15%,100% 100%,0 100%);padding:2.5rem;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.section#section-tagline h1{font-family:Anton,sans-serif;text-transform:uppercase;color:#fee903;font-size:6.2rem;line-height:6rem;padding-top:10rem;letter-spacing:4px}.section#section-rewards{background-color:#fee903;padding:4rem 1.5rem}.section#section-rewards h1{width:100%;text-align:center;font-family:Anton,sans-serif;font-size:2rem;text-transform:uppercase}.section#section-rewards ul{width:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-evenly;align-items:center;margin-top:2.5rem}.section#section-rewards ul li{width:23%;text-align:center;transition:transform .3s ease-in;cursor:pointer}.section#section-rewards ul li h2{font-family:Metal Mania,cursive;font-size:1.2rem}.section#section-rewards ul li svg{width:90px;height:90px}.section#section-rewards ul li:hover{transform:scale(1.2)}.section#section-rewards ul li:last-child svg{transform:rotate(-40deg)}.section.section-sm{height:auto}@media screen and (min-width:1100px){.section#section-main img{width:40%}.section#section-tagline h1{font-size:7.5rem;line-height:7rem}}@media screen and (min-width:1350px){.section#section-tagline h1{font-size:9rem;line-height:8.5rem}.section#section-rewards h1{font-size:4rem}.section#section-rewards ul{width:80%;margin:4rem auto 2rem}.section#section-rewards ul li svg{width:120px;height:120px}}@media screen and (max-width:750px){.section#section-tagline h1{font-size:5.5rem;line-height:5.4rem}}@media screen and (max-width:580px){.section#section-tagline h1{font-size:4.5rem;line-height:5rem}}.shop-section{width:100%;overflow-x:hidden}.shop-section#section-shop--header{height:60vh;background-position:50%;background-size:cover}.shop-section#section-shop--title{background-color:#fff;text-align:center;font-family:Dosis,sans-serif;padding:6rem}.shop-section#section-shop--title h1{font-size:3rem;font-weight:700}.shop-section#section-shop--title h2{font-size:1.8rem;font-weight:400;padding-top:.4rem;line-height:1.8rem}.shop-section#section-shop--title p{text-align:left;padding-top:2rem;font-family:Noto Sans JP,sans-serif;font-size:1rem;letter-spacing:.4px}.shop-section#section-shop--items{background-color:#eaeaea}.shop-section#section-shop--items h1{text-align:center;font-family:Noto Sans JP,sans-serif;font-size:1.45rem;padding:1rem 0;letter-spacing:14px;border-bottom:1px solid #000}.shop-section#section-shop--items .section-shop-items--container--item{padding:2rem;margin:0 2.5rem;border-bottom:1px solid #000;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.shop-section#section-shop--items .section-shop-items--container--item--description{width:30%}.shop-section#section-shop--items .section-shop-items--container--item--description h2{margin-bottom:.5rem;font-family:Metal .section-shop-items--container--item--description button{border:1px solid #000;background-color:#fff;padding:.3rem .6rem;font-family:Noto Sans button:hover{background-color:#ff40b4;border-color:#ff40b4}.shop-section#section-shop--items 12rem}.shop-section#section-shop--title h2{padding-top:.6rem}.shop-section#section-shop--title
